name: html-template-generator
description: A simple library to generate html from javascript

scripts.pretest: mkdir test/htmlTemplatesTest && mkdir test/htmlTemplatesTest/generatedTemplates && mkdir test/htmlTemplatesTest/parseFiles && touch test/htmlTemplatesTest/parseFiles/testParseToJS1.js && touch test/htmlTemplatesTest/parseFiles/testParseToJS2.js && touch test/htmlTemplatesTest/parseFiles/testParseToJson1.json && touch test/htmlTemplatesTest/parseFiles/testParseToJson2.json

author: JSystemsTech <jsystemstech@gmail.com> (http://jsystemstech.com)
